outputs.output_descr:
UNCT Annual Work Plan and Performance Appraisal Planning on a yearly basis.

Regarding the budgetary reporting within Atlas annually, we establish new activity lines covering the key result areas and re-new them on an annual basis.

The key area/outcomes in the annual  work plan format are:

Key Result Area 1: Coordination/Teamwork for Results 
1.	UN contribution to the national development plan/PRSP
2.	Aid coordination and management/Follow up to "Paris Declaration"
3.	UNDAF/Common programming
4.	Joint programmes
5.	HACT
6.	Gender equality
7.	HIV/AIDS
8.	Human Rights
9.	Common services and premises
10.	Other

Key Result Area 2: Coordination of Emergency Preparedness and Relief
11.	Coordination of Emergency Preparedness and Relief

Key Result Area 3: UN Advocacy and Resource Mobilization
12.	Joint UNCT advocacy and communications
13.	Joint UNCT resource mobilization strategy

Key Result Area 4: Security Management
14.	Security

Key Result Area 5: Non-resident UN agencies
15.	Special measures to integrate UN non-resident agencies in UNCT processes

Coordination capacity of the UNCT
16.	Strengthening UNCT Coordination Capacity

project_descr: The award contains projects in support to the Resident Coordination Secretariat (UNDOCO funding) and other funds for UNCT activities as approved by the UNCT Annually at the beginning of each year (January).
project_title: UNCT Coordination Costs - Office of the UN RC/HC
